presentation.subtitle: Front-end, Back-end or FullStack web developer, call it what you want.
presentation.description: I perceive myself as someone who has clear goals and a true passion for learning, I like to offer my support as I would like to receive it. I am someone who is clear about his person, the bad and good attitudes that make me up and who tries to correct the bad ones to improve as a person.

app-subneteo.title: Subnetting App
app-subneteo.description:
This is a web application developed with React.js and TypeScript, created with Vite,
deployed on Vercel; where you can enter an
IP address and the required networks, and you will get:
list: Sequence of decimal masks defined by the range

crypto-app.title: CryptoApp
crypto-app.description:
An app where you can obtain information about different cryptocurrencies, such as their
name, ticker, image, symbol, as well as their market data such as ATH, current price,
volume, and price change in the last hours.
